title: blue Snow
author: blue Snow
content: This thread is for the DFB-Pokal discussion, I made this as a container to discuss about that all.So, We are on 16 rounds, tomorrow's match is Numberg vs Dusseldorf andÂ  Bochum vs Dortmund.what is your prediction?

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Dortmund is able to go to the next round after beating 1-2 Bochum on away. Dortmund was excellent in 1st half injury time after creating a 0-1 score by Emre Can. but in 2nd half, Bochum equalizes the score by penalty kick kevin after Gitlens handball on the penalty box. but no wait for a long time Dortmund back to win after Bellingham creates a score with Salih's assist. with this match, Dortmund goes to the next round.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Who the winner DFB Pokal for this session?,Here the odds,Bayern is still the favorite for the champions followed by Leipzig in 2nd place and Dortmund in 3dr place. Here is the match schedule of the quarter-final,Frankfurt vs Union (4/4), Bayern vs Freiburg (5/4), Numberg vs VfB (5/4), and Leipzig vs Dortmund (5/4).

comments.author: marbet85
comments.body: This season of DFB Pokal is really interesting, because in quarter-final on 8 team, we have 6 from 1st six position from Bundesliga Table, it's really historic!Of course my prediction for win is Bayern, but as we can saw in previous years, sometimes they played this matches on 70% without proper motivation. Depends too how Freiburg going to this match, because still fight in 4 position in Bundesliga, matches vs Juventus (think so they will promotion) also not be easy. But rest of the pairs look impressive too!

comments.author: Tumanggor
comments.body: Quote from: marbet85 on March 06, 2023, 07:09:08 PMThis season of DFB Pokal is really interesting, because in quarter-final on 8 team, we have 6 from 1st six position from Bundesliga Table, it's really historic!Of course my prediction for win is Bayern, but as we can saw in previous years, sometimes they played this matches on 70% without proper motivation. Depends too how Freiburg going to this match, because still fight in 4 position in Bundesliga, matches vs Juventus (think so they will promotion) also not be easy. But rest of the pairs look impressive too! the quarter finals of the DFB-Pokal are very competitive, dortmund also have the opportunity to enter the final but just like you, bayern will again win the DFB trophy this seasonfor the match between bayern vs freiburg, surely bayern will win, if play at allianz arena, it is very rare for bayern to lose

comments.author: Rabi3
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on March 02, 2023, 08:43:15 AMWho the winner DFB Pokal for this session?,Here the odds,Bayern is still the favorite for the champions followed by Leipzig in 2nd place and Dortmund in 3dr place. Here is the match schedule of the quarter-final,Frankfurt vs Union (4/4), Bayern vs Freiburg (5/4), Numberg vs VfB (5/4), and Leipzig vs Dortmund (5/4).i really don't want to underestimate Union Berlin, if they go through Frankfurt, they have to beat either Nurnberg or Stuttgart to reach the final, and i can see it happening, so if i had to choose an underdog to win it, i'd go with either Eintracht Frankfurt or Union Berlin, their way is easy to the final.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Rabi3 on March 06, 2023, 11:09:42 PMQuote from: blue Snow on March 02, 2023, 08:43:15 AMWho the winner DFB Pokal for this session?,Here the odds,Bayern is still the favorite for the champions followed by Leipzig in 2nd place and Dortmund in 3dr place. Here is the match schedule of the quarter-final,Frankfurt vs Union (4/4), Bayern vs Freiburg (5/4), Numberg vs VfB (5/4), and Leipzig vs Dortmund (5/4).i really don't want to underestimate Union Berlin, if they go through Frankfurt, they have to beat either Nurnberg or Stuttgart to reach the final, and i can see it happening, so if i had to choose an underdog to win it, i'd go with either Eintracht Frankfurt or Union Berlin, their way is easy to the final.then, you are able to make 8x and 11x multiple bets if Eintracht and Union through to the final. And, I agree, it's not impossible, everything change can happen in football. but, even though both teams seem strong on Bundesliga. we can't still ignore Munchen and Dortmund. I don't dare yet to bet on Eintracht and Union if there is no schedule yet on who meets who in the next round. but if you still want to play, bet in under $1 is good for union.
